spec_data.Name: perl-String-Format
spec_data.Description:
String::Format lets you define arbitrary printf-like format sequences
to be expanded. This module would be most useful in configuration
files and reporting tools, where the results of a query need to be
formatted in a particular way.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:02:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Sprintf-like string formatting capabilities with arbitrary format definitions
